title: "latex-03-pressure"
output: 
  - pdf_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(gt)
```

Create a display table based on `pressure` (Vapor Pressure of Mercury as a Function of Temperature).

```{r}
gt(data = pressure) %>%
  fmt_scientific(
    columns = vars(pressure),
    decimals = 2)
```
